titles.title: Unscreened Cargo Notification Act
To direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to notify passengers when they are flying on an aircraft carrying unscreened cargo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Security, Infrastructure Protection, and Cybersecurity.

committee.subcommittee: Economic Security, Infrastructure Protection, and Cybersecurity
committee.name: House Homeland Security

bill.summary: 11/16/2005--Introduced. Unscreened Cargo Notification Act - Directs the Secretary of Homeland Security to notify all passengers flying on an aircraft carrying uninspected air cargo that the aircraft's cargo has not been screened for explosives and other hazardous materials.
